verses.niv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
verses.kjv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.
verses.esv:
14   Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed;
    save me, and I shall be saved,
    for you are my praise.

verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.niv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, so that we might die to sins and live for righteousness; by his wounds you have been healed.
verses.kjv: 24 Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
verses.esv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, that we might die to sin and live to righteousness. By his wounds you have been healed.

verses.niv: 6 "'Nevertheless, I will bring health and healing to it; I will heal my people and will let them enjoy abundant peace and security.
verses.kjv: 6 Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
verses.esv: 6 Behold, I will bring to it health and healing, and I will heal them and reveal to them abundance of prosperity and security.

verses.niv: 5 But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was upon him, and by his wounds we are healed.
verses.kjv: 5 But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
verses.esv:
5   But he was pierced for our transgressions;
    he was crushed for our iniquities;
  upon him was the chastisement that brought us peace,
    and with his wounds we are healed.

verses.niv: 3 The LORD will sustain him on his sickbed and restore him from his bed of illness.
verses.kjv: 3 The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
verses.esv:
3   The LORD sustains him on his sickbed;
    in his illness you restore him to full health.

verses.niv: 2 Praise the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits- 3 who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases, 4 who redeems your life from the pit and crowns you with love and compassion,
verses.kjv: 2 Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits: 3 Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases; 4 Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
verses.esv:
2   Bless the LORD, O my soul,
    and forget not all his benefits,
3   who forgives all your iniquity,
    who heals all your diseases,
4   who redeems your life from the pit,
    who crowns you with steadfast love and mercy,

verses.niv: 3 He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
verses.kjv: 3 He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
verses.esv:
3   He heals the brokenhearted
    and binds up their wounds.

verses.niv: 15 And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise him up. If he has sinned, he will be forgiven.
verses.kjv: 15 And the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up; and if he have committed sins, they shall be forgiven him.
verses.esv: 15 And the prayer of faith will save the one who is sick, and the Lord will raise him up. And if he has committed sins, he will be forgiven.

verses.niv: 1 The elder, To my dear friend Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
verses.kjv: 2 Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
verses.esv: 2 Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.

verses.niv: 16 Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.
verses.kjv: 16 Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
verses.esv: 16 Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.

verses.niv: 22 A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
verses.kjv: 22 A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
verses.esv:
22   A joyful heart is good medicine,
    but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

verses.niv: 1 He called his twelve disciples to him and gave them authority to drive out evil spirits and to heal every disease and sickness.
verses.kjv: 1 And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples, he gave them power against unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease.
verses.esv: 10:1 And he called to him his twelve disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal every disease and every affliction.

verses.niv: 17 But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds,' declares the LORD, 'because you are called an outcast, Zion for whom no one cares.'
verses.kjv: 17 For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the LORD; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.
verses.esv:
17   For I will restore health to you,
    and your wounds I will heal,
      declares the LORD,
  because they have called you an outcast:
    ‘It is Zion, for whom no one cares!’

verses.niv: 14 Is any one of you sick? He should call the elders of the church to pray over him and anoint him with oil in the name of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 14 Is any sick among you? let him call for the elders of the church; and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord:
verses.esv: 14 Is anyone among you sick? Let him call for the elders of the church, and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord.

verses.niv: 20 My son, pay attention to what I say; listen closely to my words. 21 Do not let them out of your sight, keep them within your heart; 22 for they are life to those who find them and health to a man's whole body.
verses.kjv: 20 My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings. 21 Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart. 22 For they are life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh.
verses.esv:
20   My son, be attentive to my words;
    incline your ear to my sayings.
21   Let them not escape from your sight;
    keep them within your heart.
22   For they are life to those who find them,
    and healing to all their flesh.

verses.niv: 26 He said, "If you listen carefully to the voice of the LORD your God and do what is right in his eyes, if you pay attention to his commands and keep all his decrees, I will not bring on you any of the diseases I brought on the Egyptians, for I am the LORD, who heals you."
verses.kjv: 26 And said, If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the LORD thy God, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his commandments, and keep all his statutes, I will put none of these diseases upon thee, which I have brought upon the Egyptians: for I am the LORD that healeth thee.
verses.esv: 26 saying, “If you will diligently listen to the voice of the LORD your God, and do that which is right in his eyes, and give ear to his commandments and keep all his statutes, I will put none of the diseases on you that I put on the Egyptians, for I am the LORD, your healer.”

verses.niv: 8 Heal the sick, raise the dead, cleanse those who have leprosy, drive out demons. Freely you have received, freely give.
verses.kjv: 8 Heal the sick, cleanse the lepers, raise the dead, cast out devils: freely ye have received, freely give.
verses.esv: 8 Heal the sick, raise the dead, cleanse lepers, cast out demons. You received without paying; give without pay.

verses.niv: 15 The LORD will keep you free from every disease. He will not inflict on you the horrible diseases you knew in Egypt, but he will inflict them on all who hate you.
verses.kjv: 15 And the LORD will take away from thee all sickness, and will put none of the evil diseases of Egypt, which thou knowest, upon thee; but will lay them upon all them that hate thee.
verses.esv: 15 And the LORD will take away from you all sickness, and none of the evil diseases of Egypt, which you knew, will he inflict on you, but he will lay them on all who hate you.

verses.niv: 2 Praise the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits- 3 who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases,
verses.kjv: 2 Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits: 3 Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;
verses.esv:
2   Bless the LORD, O my soul,
    and forget not all his benefits,
3   who forgives all your iniquity,
    who heals all your diseases,

verses.niv: 19 And my God will meet all your needs according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 19 But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
verses.esv: 19 And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.

verses.niv: 2 Be merciful to me, LORD, for I am faint; O LORD, heal me, for my bones are in agony.
verses.kjv: 2 Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
verses.esv:
2   Be gracious to me, O LORD, for I am languishing;
    heal me, O LORD, for my bones are troubled.

verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God. 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.niv: 30 Stretch out your hand to heal and perform miraculous signs and wonders through the name of your holy servant Jesus."
verses.kjv: 30 By stretching forth thine hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus.
verses.esv: 30 while you stretch out your hand to heal, and signs and wonders are performed through the name of your holy servant Jesus.”

verses.niv: 20 He sent forth his word and healed them; he rescued them from the grave.
verses.kjv: 20 He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
verses.esv:
20   He sent out his word and healed them,
    and delivered them from their destruction.
